title: Ticket #1193: Better handling of full checkpoint server
description:
Currently checkpoints are removed from the checkpoint server if the job completes or 60 days (configurable) pass without updates. In a disk full situation new checkpoints are just dropped. We can do better.

Proposal: give checkpoints short leases, may 14 days by default. A schedd will ping the checkpoint server every lease/10 days, updating the lease. When the lease expires, the checkpoint is not necessarily removed. A checkpoint is removed after 60 days of inactivity (still configurable), or if the lease is expired and disk space available is "low" (% used for checkpoints versus configurable size limit, or perhaps if disk as a whole is over 90% full).
